data.summary: Added steps for cmd.exe ENOENT remediation: validate COMSPEC/PATH/cmd.exe presence and rerun build scripts; add conditional run_build_script fallback to honor COMSPEC or PowerShell if env repair fails. Updated validation step notes to reference new blockers.
data.notes: No code changes made; plan updated to gate validation on environment checks and optional tool fallback.
